description: Wait for an asynchroous Job to finish before moving onto the next state

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This example demonstrates how AWS Step Functions workflows can integrate with events in an event-driven architecture. The example implements a workflow monitor task to react to events sent to Amazon EventBridge.
For that, the monitor task stores workflow metadata in a DynamoDB table. Events sent to EventBridge trigger Lambda functions, which send fail or success commands back to the workflow monitor task.
